attributes.action: Traffic calming and sufficient road markings Arley road Appleton Thorn Warrington to protect children parents and teachers
attributes.additional_details:
Appleton Thorn primary school is at full capacity
A result is increased traffic
Arley Road is used by local business and haulage firm.
Speed of traffic exceeds 30mph regularly.
No road markings for school
Insufficient signage
It should be reduced to 20mph near school
Traffic calming measures required to reduce speed and better management of traffic
